findings.details: Viewport meta and skip-link checked in default layout.
Main landmark uses aria-label to avoid broken aria-labelledby references across mixed layouts.
Regex scan for duplicated protocol and placeholder domains/markers.
Checks markdown links ](/path/), Liquid href/src {{ "/path/" | relative_url }}, and {% link ... %} targets.
Enable with --http-check to sample external URLs.
default.html contains {% seo %}; _config.yml includes core SEO keys.
_config.yml image points to assets/images/screenshot.png (1280x719).
_config.yml image_alt is set: Captura de tela da pÃ¡gina inicial do blog Hoa
Entries with front matter image include image_alt for social preview and accessibility metadata.
Paginated archive pages (page > 1) are marked noindex,follow to reduce duplicate listing-page indexing.
Paginated archive pages (page > 1) skip alternate hreflang tags to avoid sending duplicate language signals on noindex listings.
Canonical tag generation stays centralized in jekyll-seo-tag, and paginated archives expose prev/next/first/last rel signals for crawler consistency.
Formspree preconnect is restricted to contact pages to reduce unnecessary third-party handshakes.
Homepage avatar uses hero preload flag and eager/high fetch priority to reduce above-the-fold delays.
Homepage hero image provides srcset/sizes variants to avoid over-downloading on mobile.
theme.js is deferred without preload to avoid competing with render-critical CSS/image downloads.
Bootstrap CSS loads via stylesheet link only, avoiding extra preload hint contention on mobile.
theme.css/custom.css are discovered early via normal stylesheet links, avoiding redundant preload hints.
Share layout only preloads social image when page.preload_social_image is explicitly enabled, reducing default mobile bandwidth use.
Featured image preload is opt-in via preload_featured_image (or explicit eager/high priority), preventing unconditional preload on all post pages.
Adjacent post prefetch is opt-in via page.prefetch_adjacent_posts, avoiding unconditional mobile bandwidth consumption.
Disqus preconnect is opt-in via page.preconnect_disqus so post pages avoid default third-party handshakes on mobile.
Domains with preconnect avoid duplicated dns-prefetch hints to keep head metadata lean and avoid redundant hints.
hero_avatar_preload/preload_social_image/preload_featured_image/prefetch_adjacent_posts/preconnect_disqus use explicit true/false values.
Detected 256 http(s) links across scanned files.
Posts/blog entries with front matter image now include image_width/image_height to reduce layout shift.

recommendations: Run this audit after each content batch and fix any placeholder/malformed links.
Run with --http-check periodically (or in CI) to validate sampled external URL reachability.
